caq yaja#mAnasya ca prAqNaM cA&&*yuqScApi# daddhyAqt tasmAqnnA-nyOttaqrEShTa#kOpaqdhEyA$ svayamAtRuqNNAmupa# dadhAtyaqsau vai sva#yamAtRuqNNA- &mUmEqvOpa# dhaqttE &Svaqmupa# GrApayati prAqNamEqvAsyA$M dadhAqtyathO$ prAjApaqtyO vA aSva#H praqjApa#tinaiqvAgniM ci#nutE svayamAtRuqNNA Ba#vati prAqNAnAqmuthsRu#ShTyAq athO# suvaqrgasya# lOqkasyA&nu#KyAtyA EqShA vai ( ) dEqvAnAqM ~MvikrA$ntiqryad-vi#kaqrNI yad-vi#kaqrNImu#paqdadhA#ti dEqvAnA#mEqva vikrA$ntiqmanuq vikra#mata uttaraqta upa#dadhAtiq tasmA#duttaraqta u#pacArOq&gni rvA#yuqmatI# Bavatiq sami#ddhyai || 34
(saMBRu#taqM ~MyannA#kaqsadOq yannA#kaqsadaq - stat - pa#SUqnA-mEqShA vai-dvAvi(gm)#SatiSca) (A7)
